zh_CN.DialogText: ......在末日里独善其身或许是不错的选择......

en_US.DialogText: It may be a good choice to be alone at the end of the day

zh_CN.DialogText: 但是也没有人会搭理你了，不知是好是坏呢......

en_US.DialogText: But no one will pay attention to you. I don't know whether it's good or bad

zh_CN.DialogText: 在末日里孤独地生存下去吧....
这样孤独地活下去，真的值得吗？

en_US.DialogText: Is it really worth living alone like this?
